Ritual Items.Ability: Olantian Councillor starts the game with 2 ritual items on their character. These can be used for other abilities.

Poison Dagger.Ability: As an action, choose an adjacent character and roll a d20. On a roll higher than 10, put a poison counter on that character. At the end of each round that character rolls a d20. On a roll higher than 10 that character gains one distress. On a roll of 1 that character removes their poison counter.

Sacrifice Of Fortune.Ability: As an action, Choose an allied character and put a Fortune token on them. That character may remove this token at any time in order to reroll any one die roll

Sacrifice Of Life.Ability: As an action, Choose an allied character in line of site within 5 range and remove one distress token from them.
